item.title: The Course
item.description: The route is fairly hilly and over mixed terrain. Hopton 10k takes place on quiet roads, bridleways and footpaths in and around the small villiage on Hopton, Mirfield. 40% on quiet roads 40% bridleways 20% footpaths In case you haven’t found the answer for your question please feel free to contact us, our customer support will be happy to help you.
